很好玩的一款游戏，虽然我入坑很晚，但是这并不代表我不喜欢这款游戏，可以说是沉迷杀鸡l，希望能多出几个DLC，再就是人类已经被削成这幅b样，屠夫能不能搞一搞。还有就是服务器的事情，我在外服玩，我朋友在国内玩，有没有什么加速器，要不然真的能卡出shi，希望黎明杀机越来越火

4v1の非対称性PvP。キラーで淡々と孤独な戦いを続けるもよし、サバイバーでわいわいと連携力を試すのもよし。
操作はかなりシンプルで、同様にゲーム性も極めてシンプル。ややこしいゲームではありません。
アップデートのロードマップもすでに公開されており、早速六月から新しいタイプのキラーやサバイバーが追加されます。
楽しみ方は人それぞれ、ＰＴを組んでサバイバーができるので、友人と一緒に購入してみるのもよいでしょう。

ゲーム性やコンセプトに問題はありませんが、非対称対人ゆえに解消できない難点もあります。
キラーとサバイバーのバランスに、ほどよい落としどころが見えません。
現状でははっきりとサバイバー側が有利で、慣れてくればすぐに死んでしまう初心者の頃とはまるで異なった所感を抱くでしょう。
さらに「下げやすいランクシステム」「ディスコードなどの外部ＶＣツール」などが開発の想定以上に不均衡を助長しています。
キラーを虐めるサバイバー…というのが恒常化しており、互いに楽しもうという土壌も乏しいため煽りが目立ちます。
友人とキラーに立ち向かう…という楽しみ方は否定しませんが、せめて相手を不快にさせないプレイを心がけたいところです。もっとも、ＶＣＰＴサバイバーの行動の大概がキラーにとってはイラつくのですが。
煽られてイラつく程度には前向きに楽しめる良いゲームです。

Très bonne surprise voila trois ans qu'il est sortie j'ai toujours hésité à l'acheté mais en fin de semaine il étais gratuit donc j'ai pu le tester est franchement j'aime bien ce jeux. Très bonne embience, moi qui est fan de film d'horreur.

这个游戏的可玩性对于我来说真的太多了，每个人类的熟练度，等级的提升，技能的合理搭配，屠夫的熟练度，各种走位，套路，好笑，惊险，刺激的时刻，太有意思了，可能好玩的游戏不止这一个，但是现在在我的心里排名第一的就是杀鸡了，因为这个还交到了很多朋友，感觉生活都充满了乐趣和美好，希望这个游戏可以越做越好，虽然不是从一开始就玩了的，但是以后的日子我肯定会一直玩下去的！
本菜鸡的上树体验非常开心，以后会再来滴。

You can definitely tell which killers are bought in the Steam Store. The purchased killers completely kill the balance of the game. Reminds me of the League of Legends business model where they release OP heros then nerf them in 1-2 patches after people have already bought them. 

I'll update this review later if I see anything different later in the game. I'm only level 12 at this point.

Edit: Revising my review: It's still pay to win.

Игра дарит эмоции. Смех, страх, панику, злость, жалость. Равнодушно у меня не прошел ни один матч. Да, тут бывают кемпедристы, но это, в основном, новички. Бывают "тру сурвомансеры", которые считают своим долгом затроллить мана, который менее опытен. Но в основном это адекватное комьюнити, настоящий тимплей и честная игра. Незнакомцы жертвуют собой ради спасения твоей задницы, а ты жертвуешь своей. Киллеры заставляют по потеть и подумать над следующим шагом. А игра за маньяка - это надо попробовать. Это очень интересно, не считая игр против имбагеев и тру сурвомансеров. Рекомендую к покупке, не будьте токсичными ушлепками и наслаждайтесь игрой:)

If you're an M, play survivor at low ranks with no perks.
If you're an S, play survivor at high ranks.
If you're a super S, play killer at low ranks.
If you're a super M play killer at high ranks with no perks.
If you're an M/S, play killer at high ranks with meta build.

I assure you, you will be satisfied if you follow these instructions.

...and if you're normal, I'm afraid this game is not for you.

The first week I was playing this game, "ooh this is fun but their are many balance problems", Killers and survivers felt OP on both sides and the way you get bloodpoints as a surviver was awful. I thought the devs were lazy because of a lack of communication. I was wrong, after the last patch they did so much, added a new killer, surviver, fixed a 3 pages long list of bugs, balanced things in a good way. Even tho developers get a lot negative reactions from everybody. I still think they deserve my money, They listen to the community. One minus side which I mentioned earlier, the communication with the developers, you really have to dig deep to find upcoming updates. I recommend this game to everyone who likes a little bit of horror and some really thrilling survival, even if you play solo this game is great.

Something I really would like that they add is
In Game Voice chat
Don't get me wrong here guys, most of the players in this game are really team friendly, they will help you for the cost of their lifes. Still I think the Voice Chat would help a lot for more team spitit between the survivers.

Никогда не думал, что в 2020 году, спустя успешных 4 года, игра скатится в отвратительную помойку с постоянными лагами, вылетами, не загрузками, токсичными игроками с овер 4к часов игры (вопрос как им не надоело?). У этой игры будущего нет, покупать ее сейчас я не советую никому.

The game is going to need an overhaul at some point due to the amount of required items and because of the "meta" and ranking up makes the game less and less fun to play due to the lack of diversity inside of the game at a core because it will be the same killer again and again which are mostly dlc characters.

Speaking of dlc the current price of the game and dlc to keep with the meta and getting good perks when coming into the game is nearly two hundred dollars and you have to take in mind that there has not been any characters recently put in the base game for a long time now which is frustrating because you just see the price to get all the characters go up every few months.

also not to come off as a jerk or anything like that but the community is pretty toxic like really toxic for instance two years ago I had a guy who lived across the world from me comment on my profile because I was lagy in a lobby and took it like it was my fault that I randomly put into there and yes I deleted their comments because it was just plain stupid and I have had others that just put slurs on my comments with no real sign of positivity.

I have not talked about the gameplay yet and that's because of how many variables there are you have four survivor's, one killer, five generators, five totems, three chests, two exit gates, a set amount of hooks and pallets all in set random locations and if you do not know the objective survivors want to escape so they do the generators and try to open the exit gate and can stun the killer by throwing a pallet onto them killers on the other hand have to hook the survivors at least three times sound simple? because it is when using no perks or addons or killer ability's now we talk about those perks I mentioned a while back killers and survivors both can get them and the ability go from throwing a pebble or being able to escape from the killers grasp or for killer it can be that you are slightly faster or you can grab survivors for longer there are 170 different perks which some are locked behind dlc.

the game is good but it has way to many problems that need to adressed with no bias when looking into the survivors point of view and the killers and well I would still recommend the game but make sure you know what you are getting yourself into.

Вердикт Dead of Daylight: Дерьмо.


- Идинственая игра где не маньяк насилует людей а люди насилуют маньяка. - DEV.

匹配特别慢，大概五到十分钟才能排到人，而且匹配到的都是满技能的。新人体验极差。

升到15段补个评论，匹配速度大幅提高，大概只需要五分钟了，虽然还是有点慢，但也可以了。这次要说拔线的，和嘲讽的。这两种人真的神烦。无论是队友还是对手，遇到这两种人总会带来很差的游戏体验。
拔线的惩罚必须加大，这点希望尽快改善。
赢了说对面菜，输了说对面狗。还没事对着鬼做动作，挂到人疯狂鞭尸。门都开了，队友被挂了不去救。出去了还在公屏嘲讽队友菜的。
甚至还有zz骂不放他走的，你全场拿手电疯狂照，隔着板子1212的，都没把自己当新手，被挂死没毛病吧。这种人真的很恶心。
顺便再补个守尸的问题，我认为守尸也是一种打法，没必要特别笔诛口伐，虽然我玩人的时候遇到守尸的也比较烦，但是也不至于看到守尸的就去骂。毕竟，和上面两种比起来，这至少是正常的游戏方式。记得有一把玩人，有个zz队友开局秒倒，然后秒拔线，然后极其艰难的我和另一个人跑了，因为屠夫守尸守了四台机的时间。然后结算界面，那个队友竟然开始骂起来了屠夫，就因为守尸。但是这时候，拔线的难道不是最应该唾弃的吗？
сколько в помойку не играй,лучше она будет и дальше становится

Toxic virgin SWF's with 4 deceistive strikes made this game unfun.  That explains the lack of killers literally nobody wants to play killer right now.  Trash game always been filled with bugs since day 1 and vaults always been in favor of survivors yet they cry that killer is overpowered. Buying this is a waste of money once you play it you most likely won't come back when tasting the killer experience.

Since the latest update, all players are disconnecting and they are not punished at all because of this. The game crashes frequently, and when entering in a lobby and the match is starting, in 70% of the cases the game freezes, or the killer disconnects instantly making you lose the offering that was burned.

Glitches are happening like when vaulting a window, the player character's animation is freezed, and we "slide" on the map.

I did not have this worst experience with any multiplayer game EVER. Instead of fixing the bugs that the game has, new characters are released, and all kids scream at the new characters "OMG NEW CHARACTERS YES I WILL BUY THEM ALL". 

Please fix the bugs that are present in this game and then release new characters;
Please implement a penalty system for those who are disconnecting, like a cool-down system that CS:GO has, so that they stop this kind of behaviour;
And finally, please forbid killers who have ping over 200 to create a lobby as they exploit the game.

Overall, the game experience has changed for the worst and I regret investing money in it. I am still playing it as the concept behind it is pretty great and some times I am having fun, but the amount of times that I am being disconnected due to killer's disconnection or because of game halt when loading the map is outstanding and extremely frustrating.

When the survivors work good together, its hard to even kill one.
When they don't, mostly only one can escape through the hatch.

Its still makes some fun at one point.
